about.title: About Us
about.classicQuote: There's a story behind every person; this is ours.

userhan.intro: Han enjoys exploring opensource programs that occasionally, be, totally unrelated to his daily work. He has been doing Java thoughout his career. He is capable to setup a complete system; from Server up till the Presentation layer.
userhan.hobby: Han's hobby varies from photography to outdoor hiking; which he believes out there, are many who shared the same interest as well.

usertai.intro: She's the heart and soul of the project. She's a young and talented web programmer. Well, it's difficult to find a lady programmer, any day, any time. She's an experienced front-end designer and coder.
usertai.quote: "Beauty is to an eye of the believer." Gladys is the inspiration to Han and that's how it all begin.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.desc: The Walcron website was an idea invented by the both of us. Internet has continuously grown and started to evolve rapidly in our era. We take this opportunity, to experiment and pushing ourselves to use new and advance technologies.

interest.title: Interested with us ?
interest.detail: If you are interested to contact us, either for the development, progress, advice, photos, freelance, etc. Find even more information about us, in the section below.

notfound.title: Page not found
notfound.desc: The page you are looking for could not be located. Please check if you had entered the correct url.
notfound.link: If you are lost please click on this 'sentence' to redirect yourself to the main site
